reviewText:
When you buy this movie pack, you get the first and the best Puppet Master series! This includes Puppet Master, Puppet Master 2, and Puppet Master 3: Toulon's Revenge.
In Puppet Master, five psychics hear rumors that Andre Toulon has uncovered the secret of life. When they go to investigate, they find out that Andre Toulon has created puppets. But the one thing about these puppets is that they have a hunger for murder.
In Puppet Master 2, residents at the Bodega Bay Inn encounter Andre Toulon and his army of killer puppets.
In Puppet Master 3, Andre Toulon and his puppets fight off the evil Nazis in World War II, Germany. When good puppets go bad. The best in the series!
This is a must have for Puppet Master lovers. All 3 movies are rated R.
